div.l: That yf a man in oo poynt be a greued
That in an oþer he shal be releued
Oure corn is stolen sothly it is no nay
And we han had an ille fyt to day
And syn I shal haue noon amendement
A gaym my losse I wil haue esement
Bi goddes saule it shal nan oþer be
This Iohn answerd Aley a vise þe
The Meller is a ꝑperilous man he seide
And yf þat he out of his slepe a braide
He might don vs boþe a vilany
Alayn answerd I counte him nouȝt a flye
And vp he rist and bi þe wenche he crepte
This wenche lay vp right and faste slepte
Til he so nygh was or she mighte spye
That it hadde ben to late for to crye
And shortly for to seyn þei were at oon
Now play alayn for I wil speke of Iohn
This Iohn lith stille a forlong wey or two
And to him self he maketh reuthe ⁊and woo
Allas qduod he þis is a wikke Iape
Now may I seyn þat I is but an ape
Yit haþ my felow som what for his harm
He haþ þe Melleres doughter in his arm
He auentred him ⁊and hath his nedes spedde
And I lye as a draf sacche in my bedde
And whan þis Iape is told anoþer day
I shal be holde a daffe a cokenay
I wol a rise and auntre it be my fayth
Vnhardy is vnsely þus men saith
And vp he ros ⁊and softly he went
Vn to þe cradel and in his hond it hent
And bare it softe vnto his beddes fete
Sone after þe wif hire Routing lete
And gan to wake and went hir͗e out to pisse
And com a gayn and gan hire cradel misse
And groped here and þere but she fond noon
Allas qduod she I hadde almost misgon
I hadde almoste gon to þe Clerkes bedde
Ey bn̄enedicite þan hadde I foule I spedde
And forth she goth til she þe cradel fonde
